name: Strength Potion
description: A potion that temporarily boosts the drinker's strength and melee damage.
looks: The potion is a vibrant red color, swirling with energy.

name: Invisibility Potion
description: A potion that grants the user invisibility for a short period of time.
looks: A small, clear glass bottle containing a transparent liquid that seems to shimmer and ripple.

name: Fireball Scroll
description: A scroll containing the spell to cast a powerful fireball.
looks: The scroll is made of ancient parchment and is sealed with a wax seal. The seal bears the image of a flaming fireball.

special_effects.Fiery Explosion: Upon impact, the fireball explodes, dealing additional area of effect damage.

name: Cursed Dagger
description: A wicked dagger imbued with dark magic.
looks: The blade of the dagger is black as night, with intricate engravings of runes and symbols.

special_effects.Curse of Darkness: Causes target to suffer from blindness for a short duration

name: Invisibility Cloak
description: A magical cloak that grants the wearer the ability to turn invisible.
looks: The cloak is made of a shimmering, translucent fabric that seems to blend into its surroundings.

special_effects.Invisibility: Grants the ability to turn invisible for a limited time

name: Brewer's Yeast
description: A key ingredient used in brewing potions.
looks: A fine powder made from fermented grains.

name: Fireball Scroll
description: A scroll containing the Fireball spell.
looks: A rolled-up parchment with intricate, fiery runes inscribed on it.

special_effects.ignite: Ignites the target, causing additional damage over time.

name: Slow Healing Potion
description: A potion that restores health points.
looks: A small, glass vial filled with a glowing, green liquid.

name: Invisibility Cloak
description: A magical cloak that grants the wearer the ability to turn invisible for a short period of time.
looks: The cloak is made of a silky, black material and has a shimmering effect when touched by light.

special_effects.Invisibility: Allows the wearer to turn invisible for 10 seconds.

name: Fireball Scroll
description: A scroll containing a powerful fireball spell.
looks: The scroll is made of ancient parchment, with a burning fireball symbol etched on it.

special_effects.Burning: Enemies struck by the fireball will suffer ongoing burn damage.
